```{r}
#| label: regmedfunc
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

medcontfunc_inner <- function(data, impdata, novars, medvar, nomeddiff, val = "Increase") {
  modvarstmp <- c(modvars, "sos_lm_rasiarni1", "sos_lm_bbl1", "sos_lm_mra1", "sos_lm_loop1")
  modvarstmp <- setdiff(modvarstmp, novars)
  modvarsmedtmp <- c(modvars, "sos_lm_rasiarni1", "sos_lm_bbl1", "sos_lm_mra1", "sos_lm_loop1", "bbldiff", "rasiarnidiff", "mradiff", "loopdiff")
  modvarsmedtmp <- setdiff(modvarsmedtmp, nomeddiff)
  modvarsmedtmp <- setdiff(modvarsmedtmp, novars)

  moduni <- summary(glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " ~ crt")),
    data = data
  ))

  modadj <- with(impdata, glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " ~ crt + ", paste(modvarstmp, collapse = " + ")))))
  modadj <- summary(pool(modadj))

  modadjmed <- with(impdata, glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " ~ crt + ", paste(modvarsmedtmp, collapse = " + ")))))
  modadjmed <- summary(pool(modadjmed))

  ds <- rsdata %>%
    group_by(crt) %>%
    summarise(
      me = fn(mean(!!sym(medvar), na.rm = T), dig = 1),
      sd = fn(sd(!!sym(medvar), na.rm = T), dig = 1)
    ) %>%
    mutate(out = paste0(me, " (", sd, ")")) %>%
    ungroup()

  out <- tibble(
    Med = medvar,
    ds_nocrt = ds %>% filter(crt == "No CRT") %>% pull(out),
    ds_crt = ds %>% filter(crt == "CRT") %>% pull(out),
    uni = paste0(
      fn(moduni$coefficients[2, "Estimate"], 2), " (",
      fn(moduni$coefficients[2, "Estimate"] - global_z05 * moduni$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"], 2), "-",
      fn(moduni$coefficients[2, "Estimate"] + global_z05 * moduni$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"], 2), "), ",
      fn(moduni$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|t|)"], dig = 3, p = T)
    ),
    mult = paste0(
      fn(modadj$estimate[2], 2), " (",
      fn(modadj$estimate[2] - global_z05 * modadj$std.error[2], 2), "-",
      fn(modadj$estimate[2] + global_z05 * modadj$std.error[2], 2), "), ",
      fn(modadj$p.value[2], dig = 3, p = T)
    ),
    multmed = paste0(
      fn(modadjmed$estimate[2], 2), " (",
      fn(modadjmed$estimate[2] - global_z05 * modadjmed$std.error[2], 2), "-",
      fn(modadjmed$estimate[2] + global_z05 * modadjmed$std.error[2], 2), "), ",
      fn(modadjmed$p.value[2], dig = 3, p = T)
    )
  )
  return(out)
}

medcontfunc <- function(data, impdata, novars = NULL, check = F) {
  rasiarni <- medcontfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "rasiarnidiff", nomeddiff = c("rasiarnidiff"))
  rasiarni_exarni <- medcontfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "rasiarnidiff_exarni", nomeddiff = c("rasiarnidiff"))
  mra <- medcontfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "mradiff", nomeddiff = c("mradiff"))
  bbl <- medcontfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "bbldiff", nomeddiff = c("bbldiff"))
  loop <- medcontfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "loopdiff", nomeddiff = c("loopdiff"))
  tabgdmt <- bind_rows(bbl, rasiarni, rasiarni_exarni, mra, loop)

  tabgdmt <- tabgdmt %>%
    mutate(
      Med = str_remove_all(Med, "_|diff"),
      Med = factor(Med,
        levels = c("bbl", "rasiarni", "rasiarniexarni", "mra", "loop"),
        labels = c("Beta-blocker", "ACEi/ARB/ARNi", "ACEi/ARB", "MRA", "Loop diuretic")
      )
    )

  cn <- c("Medication", "No CRT", "CRT", "Crude", "Adjusted baseline", "Adjusted baseline + change in medications")

  # excel
  make_one_xlsxsheet(tabgdmt, colnames = cn)

  cn <- sanitize_text(cn)

  default_kable(tabgdmt,
    escape = FALSE,
    col.names = cn
  ) %>%
    add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "Mean (sd) change" = 2, "Estimate (95% CI), p-value" = 3))
}
```

#| tbl-pos: "H"

medcontfunc(data = rsdata, impdata = imprsdata)
